translation.en: [Sachin] ...inside the school. And then guess who found him?
Go over and tell her who you are and get her one coffee.
No, I don't have money for it.
-I'll pay for the coffee. Please? -[Arjun] He'll pay for it.
She's looking at you. She's blushing.
She's blushing. Dude, she wants you.
[in Hindi] Hasn't your father told you to come straight home after school?
translation.fr: Ton père t'a dit de rentrer direct, non ?

translation.en: Hey! What's up? He talk to her yet?
translation.fr: Salut. Ça roule ? Tu lui as parlé ?

translation.en: Did you talk to her yet?
Did he talk to... Come on, Ovi. You gotta go talk to her.
I know what you need. Come on.
translation.fr: J'ai ce qu'il te faut. Viens.

translation.en: Try it. Take one hit, man, it'll help you.
translation.fr: Vas-y. Tire une taffe. Ça t'aidera.

translation.en: [officer in Hindi] Having fun tonight, boys?
I think you dropped something, no?
translation.fr: Tu as perdu un truc, non ?

translation.en: -No, it's not ours. -[in English] Chill. Relax.
You got your whole lives ahead of you.
translation.fr: Vous avez la vie devant vous.

translation.en: [in Hindi] I told you, you dumb motherfucker,

translation.fr: de le tenir constamment à l'œil.

translation.en: ...and yet Amir Asif has grabbed my son.

translation.fr: La rançon n'est pas le problème, Saju.

translation.en: You think I can't hurt you from here?
translation.fr: Que je ne peux pas t'atteindre, d'ici ?

translation.en: You want your son to see his next birthday?
translation.fr: Tu veux voir ton filsà son prochain anniversaire ?

translation.en: [in Hindi] Tell Mahajan to pay the ransom and get his son back.
translation.fr: Mahajan n'a qu'à payer la rançon.

translation.en: Why are they getting us involved in this?

translation.fr: Il n'y a pas assez d'argent.

translation.en: The NCB have frozen Mahajan's assets.
translation.fr: Les Stups ont gelé les avoirs de Mahajan.

translation.en: [in Hindi] There's a man who does this sort of thing.
translation.fr: Il y a un homme qui fait ces choses-là.

translation.en: His price will be out of Mahajan's reach.
But there's a way I can play this.
translation.fr: Mais je peux tenter un truc.

translation.en: [Rata] You sure, bruh? 'Cause he looks fuckin' dead.
translation.fr: Sûr ? Il a l'air mort, putain.

translation.en: -Hold my beer, would you? -Oh, I gotcha.
-I said hold it. Don't drink it. -[Koen] I gotcha.
translation.fr: - Tiens-la. La bois pas.- Ça marche.

translation.en: There's a chicken in your bathroom.
translation.fr: Il y a un poulet dans ta salle de bains.

translation.en: Yeah, I like chickens, except when they shit everywhere.
translation.fr: J'adore les poulets,sauf quand ils chient partout.

translation.en: Extraction. Indian kid. Drug lord's son.
translation.fr: - Oui ?- Exfiltration. Un jeune Indien. Fils d'un baron de la drogue.

translation.en: A rival gangster is holding this kid in Dhaka.
translation.fr: Un gangster rival le détient à Dacca.

translation.en: I think Gaspar lives in Dhaka.
Gaspar is out of the game.
Clock's running at 16 hours. Deadline, Friday, noon.
translation.fr: Ça fait 16 heures.Date limite, vendredi à midi.

translation.en: Proof of life as of six hours ago.
translation.fr: Preuve de vie il y a six heures.

translation.en: This gangster, Amir Asif, he holds a massive sway in Dhaka.
translation.fr: Ce gangster, Amir Asif,est très influent à Dacca.

translation.en: You get your hands on this kid, it's gonna get complicated.
translation.fr: Quand tu auras le gosse,tout va se compliquer.

translation.en: Nik, what are you doing here? Don't bullshit yourself.
translation.fr: Nik, qu'est-ce que tu veux ?Arrête de te raconter des salades.

translation.en: No one else is gonna commit to somethin' this fucked up.
translation.fr: Personne n'acceptera un truc aussi pourri.

translation.en: You're hoping if you spin the chamber enough times,
translation.fr: T'espères qu'en jouantà la roulette russe,

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, I'll meet you in Fitzroy Crossing.
translation.fr: Je t'attends demain matinà Fitzroy Crossing.

translation.en: If you're not sober, don't show up.
translation.fr: Viens pas si t'as pas dessoûlé.

translation.en: [Yaz] This is our extract. Ovi Mahajan, 14 years old.
translation.fr: Voilà la cible à extraire.Ovi Mahajan, 14 ans.

translation.en: His father, Ovi Mahajan Senior, is in jail.
translation.fr: Son père, Ovi Mahajan Senior,est en prison.

translation.en: So, his people employed us to get the boy back,
translation.fr: On a été engagéspour récupérer le gosse.

translation.en: [Yaz] Amir Asif. Dhaka's very own Pablo Escobar.
translation.fr: Amir Asif. Le Pablo Escobar de Dacca.

translation.en: Biggest drug lord in India versus biggest drug lord in Bangladesh.
translation.fr: Le plus gros baron de la drogueindien contre celui du Bangladesh.

translation.en: [Yaz] A lot of bad blood between them.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup d'animosité entre eux.

translation.en: This is our extraction point. So, José and Thiago will man a boat,
translation.fr: Voici notre point d'extraction.José et Thiago récupéreront un bateau,

translation.en: ferry you and the kid nine miles down the river to a chopper.
translation.fr: ils te conduiront avec le gosse15 km plus bas, à un hélico.

translation.en: [Yaz] Maybe 20. Okay, clock is ticking. Let's chop-chop!
translation.fr: Vingt, peut-être. Le temps presse. Dépêchons !

translation.en: [Kalam] You see the laundry across the street?
translation.fr: Tu vois la blanchisserie, en face ?

translation.en: [in English] You show me the kid's all right, I tell my people, they pay you.
translation.fr: Montrez que le gosse va bien,et on vous paiera.

translation.en: Listen, you boys seem like real busy professionals,
translation.fr: Vous m'avez l'air de vrais pros,

translation.en: so let's say we cut this shit and get down to business, yeah?
translation.fr: alors arrêtons les connerieset passons aux affaires.

translation.en: [in English] Hey, man, you're crazy or what?
stick in his ass and blow his insides out.
translation.fr: je lui enfile dans le cul et je l'explose.

translation.en: No! No, Amir, no! Amir, no! [screams]
Anybody feel like they remember now?
I know who took the money.
You just threw him off the roof.
translation.fr: Vous venez de le balancer du toit.
Regardez et prenez-en de la graine.

translation.en: You need to be smart. Use your wits.
translation.fr: Il faut être malin. Utiliser sa tête.

translation.en: Cut off two of your fingers.
Because the kid who stole from me is dead.
translation.fr: Parce que le gosse qui m'a volé est mort.

translation.en: And I'd like a walking reminder
translation.fr: Et je veux un rappel ambulant

translation.en: of what happens when you touch my money.
translation.fr: de ce qui arrivesi on touche à mon argent.
Je te conseille la main gauche.

translation.en: So you can still hold a gun.

translation.fr: Je suis en train de parler !

translation.en: or you'll lose more than just a finger.
translation.fr: ou ce sera plus qu'un doigtque vous perdrez.

translation.en: Kid, you wanna survive, you do exactly as I say.
translation.fr: Pour t'en tirer, fais ce que je dis.

translation.en: Here. Eat this. Your blood sugar is low, that's why you feel like shit.
translation.fr: Tu te sens pas bien. Mange sucré.

translation.en: Twenty-one hundred meters out. In possession.
translation.fr: On est à 2 100 mètres. En position.

translation.en: [Nik on radio] Copy. Alpha team is with the boat. In position.
translation.fr: Bien reçu. L'équipe Alpha est au bateau.En position.

translation.en: Say your bloody name, come on.

translation.fr: Prêts pour l'exfiltration. On y va.

translation.en: Satellite's online. Rake and the kid are on route.
translation.fr: Téléphone satellite connecté.Rake et le gosse sont en route.

translation.en: [Tyler on radio] You guys ready for us? We're 1,600 meters out.
translation.fr: Vous êtes prêts ? On est à 1 600 mètres.

translation.en: You have seven minutes to transfer the funds.
translation.fr: Vous avez 7 min pour le virement.
Ici G. Je suis en position.

translation.en: [Thiago on radio] There's an alarm going off in the engine room.
-G, I need you to be my eyes. -Copy that.
translation.fr: - G, monte la garde pour moi.- Bien reçu.

translation.en: [colonel in Bengali] Blockades have been set up on every bridge into and out of Dhaka.
translation.fr: Tous les ponts de Dacca sont bloqués.

translation.en: I have teams combing the Buriganga as we speak.
translation.fr: Des équipes passentle Buriganga au peigne fin.

translation.en: Get him a gun. Put his fingers to work.
translation.fr: File-lui un flingue.Que ses doigts travaillent.

translation.en: [Ovi in English] I... I can't breathe.
Yeah, we gotta keep moving. Come on.
Rake's about five minutes from the boat.
translation.fr: Rake est à 5 min du bateau.

translation.en: Where are we at with the transfer?
Call them back. Tell them they have 60 seconds to make the transfer.
translation.fr: Rappelle-les. Ils ont 60 secondespour faire le virement.

translation.en: Or they'll find Ovi's body floating in the Buriganga.
translation.fr: Sinon le corps d'Ovi flotteradans le Buriganga.

translation.en: -Give me verbal. -[G on radio] G here.
Tyler, something's wrong. Hold your position.
translation.fr: Tyler, quelque chose cloche.Reste où tu es.

translation.en: G, you got eyes on the boat?
I'm looking at it right now. Our boys haven't come up yet.
translation.fr: Droit devant moi.Nos hommes sont pas remontés.

translation.en: I'm moving in for a closer look.
[in Bengali] Colonel, stand by. We think we found something.
translation.fr: Colonel, je crois qu'on a quelque chose.

translation.en: -Nik, you're gonna wanna see this. -What is it?
-Two hundred meters and closing in fast. -G?
translation.fr: - À 200 mètres et ils approchent vite.- G ?

translation.en: There's someone else in those woods.
translation.fr: Il y a quelqu'un pas loin.

translation.en: About a hundred meters out and closing in on your position.
translation.fr: À une centaine de mètres,et il vient vers toi.

translation.en: Kid... Move fast. Stay low. Go!
[man in Bengali] We need air support by the river.
translation.fr: Il nous faut un appui aérien.

translation.en: I'm here to take you home!
-[in English] Saju, I'm here! -Sit down and shut up!
translation.fr: - Saju, je suis là !- Assis et ferme-la !

translation.en: [in English] I need the boy! I won't hurt him!
translation.fr: Il me faut le gamin ! Je lui ferai rien !

translation.en: When I tell you to, run like hell or I'm gonna kill you both. Understand?
translation.fr: À mon signal, cours à fondou je vous tue tous les deux. Vu ?

translation.en: Go on, kid. Go, go! Go! Come on.
-Here, get in the car. Get in the car. -[Saju] Stop running!
translation.fr: - Monte dans la voiture.- Arrête de courir !

translation.en: Please let me go! Saju works for my father.
translation.fr: Laissez-moi ! Saju bosse pour mon père.

translation.en: I work for your father. But something is fucked here.
translation.fr: Je bosse pour ton père.Mais un truc cloche.

translation.en: Saju could have a deal with the men who grabbed you and send you back to them.
translation.fr: Saju est peut-être de mècheavec tes agresseurs.

translation.en: -Then take me to the police. -The cops are in on it.
translation.fr: - Livrez-moi à la police.- Elle y est mêlée.

translation.en: Look, if you wanna live, you have to trust me.
translation.fr: Si tu veux vivre, faut me faire confiance.

translation.en: I need eyes. Radio's compromised. Call my sat.
translation.fr: Il me faut des yeux. Appelez mon portable.

translation.en: [Nik on phone] Turn right, after the bridge.
-[Tyler] How far past the gate? -What gate?
-Turn right. -Can't. Bloody truck is in the way.
translation.fr: - Tourne à droite.- Impossible. Y a un camion.

translation.en: [Nik on phone] Up ahead, make a left.
No, no, no! Left! You just passed it.
translation.fr: Non, à gauche ! Tu l'as manqué.

translation.en: It's been on. You drive like you're insane!
translation.fr: Elle est attachée.Vous roulez comme un taré !

translation.en: [Tyler] We gotta move. Go. Up the stairs.
translation.fr: Il faut bouger. Dépêche.Monte les escaliers.

translation.en: Get up the stairs. Go. Come on. Move!
All right, kid. Do you trust me?
Stay on my shoulder, all right?
Get in, kid. Come on. Come on!
All right, kid. I need you to slide on over here.
translation.fr: Petit, tu dois passer de ce côté.

translation.en: Okay, we're gonna jump on three. All right?
translation.fr: On va sauter à trois. Vu ?

translation.en: [man in Bengali over radio] The vehicle crashed. It flipped over and is in flames.
translation.fr: Le camion s'est renversé et il est en feu.

translation.en: I want to see the bodies.
I want every gun in Dhaka pointed at this guy.
translation.fr: Tous les flingues de Daccadoivent être pointés sur ce type.

translation.en: All right. Close the door. Close it.
Can you give me a hand?
I need a hand. Hold that on there.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin que tu tiennes ça là.

translation.en: Just hook it through there and then pull it back this way.
[Nik on phone] Our new friend is Saju Rav. Ex-Special Forces.
translation.fr: Notre ami est Saju Rav.Ex des forces spéciales.

translation.en: He works for the kid's father.
translation.fr: Il bosse pour le père du petit.

translation.en: Mahajan got us to do the heavy lifting and he doesn't wanna pay.
translation.fr: Mahajan nous a confié le sale boulotet il veut pas payer.
- La ville est bouclée. Tu es planqué ?- Oui.

translation.en: There's a clearing on east side of Sultana Kamal Bridge,
translation.fr: Il y a une clairière à l'estdu pont Sultana Kamal,

translation.en: just outside the city. We can send a chopper and get you out.
translation.fr: à la sortie de la ville.On peut envoyer un hélico te chercher.

translation.en: You gotta leave the kid behind, Tyler.
[Ovi] Are you gonna leave me in the street?
translation.fr: Vous allez m'abandonner dans la rue ?

translation.en: The only chance of getting my money is you, mate. So...
translation.fr: Tu es ma seule chance d'avoir mon argent.

translation.en: Piano. I play the piano when I'm nervous.
translation.fr: Je joue du piano quand je suis stressé.

translation.en: My father hates it when I do it.
translation.fr: Mon père déteste quand je le fais.

translation.en: He thinks of me the same way you do.
translation.fr: Il me voit comme vous me voyez.

translation.en: More like a thing than a person.
translation.fr: Comme un objet et non une personne.

translation.en: I didn't... I didn't mean it like that.
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que je voulais dire.

translation.en: [Saju in Hindi] Listen to me carefully.
If you don't hear from me in the next 12 hours...
translation.fr: Si tu n'as pas de mes nouvellesdans les 12 heures,

translation.en: [Neysa in Hindi] Aarav, Papa's on the phone.
[in Hindi] Are you coming home soon?
When you wake up in the morning.
translation.fr: Quand tu te réveilleras le matin.

translation.en: [Nik] You got a chopper. Meet you at the east side of the bridge.
translation.fr: Un hélico va t'attendredu côté est du pont.

translation.en: -[in Bengali] Hey, this guy wants my gun! -My ankle is broken!
translation.fr: - Ce type veut mon flingue !- J'ai la cheville cassée !

translation.en: My friend is gonna shoot you!
Hey! Give me my gun... Give it back!
That's my gun, give it back to me!
-Give it back or I'll blow you away! -[Farhad] I will finish you off.
[officer over megaphone] You are surrounded. Please surrender...
-[officer continues indistinctly] -Fuck! Come on. We gotta move.
[over megaphone] Stop or we will have to shoot.
We just got attacked by the goonies from hell. We made it about four blocks.
translation.fr: Des sbires nous ont attaqués.On a avancé de quatre rues.

translation.en: I said get rid of the kid.
I don't give a shit what you said.
translation.fr: Je me tape de ce que tu as dit.

translation.en: We're in the worst smelling sewer on the planet.
translation.fr: On est dans les pires égouts du monde.

translation.en: There's about 200 cops over our heads. Just call Gaspar.
translation.fr: Il y a 200 flics au-dessus de nous.Appelle Gaspar.

translation.en: Tyler, I don't think that's a good idea.
The guy owes me his life, Nik.
translation.fr: Je lui ai sauvé la peau, Nik.

translation.en: I appreciate you coming for us.
What the hell is wrong with you? Don't insult me.
translation.fr: Tu te fous de moi ? Me vexe pas.

translation.en: We are south of the city center.
I told Nik that an extraction is... It's not feasible.
translation.fr: J'ai dit à Nik qu'une exfiltration...C'est pas faisable.

translation.en: Well, you know, the city is surrounded by rivers.
translation.fr: La ville est entourée de rivières.

translation.en: There are bridges going in and out.
But every one of those bridges currently is blocked by a roadblock
translation.fr: Mais tous les ponts sont bloquéspar des barrages,

translation.en: because you are a very popular individual.
translation.fr: parce que tu es très populaire.

translation.en: I figure we lie low a couple days, we let the panic dissipate.
translation.fr: Faisons profil bas quelques jours,que la panique s'apaise.

translation.en: And we'll get you going. Now, my wife made that.
translation.fr: Et après, on te fera partir. C'est un plat de ma femme.

translation.en: So, I want you to be very careful what you say.
translation.fr: Alors, attention à ce que tu dis.

translation.en: And what's that for, the knee?
Hang on one sec... my knee. Ow! Oh, God. Oh, it hurts.
translation.fr: Attends une seconde. Mon genou.Aïe. J'ai mal.

translation.en: Okay. I gotta go. I gotta go.
But you stay here and rest up. And I will be back.
translation.fr: Mais reste ici te reposer. Je reviendrai.

translation.en: It's good to see you, man. I missed you.
translation.fr: Content de te voir, mec. Tu m'as manqué.

translation.en: [in Bengali] Don't you see I'm eating?
I lost him... near the market.
translation.fr: Je l'ai perdu près du marché.

translation.en: Tell them to scour the market.
I want to be the one to pull the trigger.
translation.fr: je veux appuyer sur la gâchette.

translation.en: If you let me do that,
I'll give you the other finger!
He made me feel like a fool.

translation.fr: Je vais te donner un conseil, un cadeau.

translation.en: Because no matter how badass you think you are...
translation.fr: Même si tu te prends pour un dur,

translation.en: there's always a badass who's bigger than you.
translation.fr: il y a toujours un plus gros dur que toi.

translation.en: If you had been killed today, it would have been my fault.
translation.fr: Si tu t'étais fait tuer aujourd'hui,ça aurait été ma faute.

translation.en: No, mate. But it would've been my fault.
translation.fr: Non, petit. Mais ça aurait été la mienne.

translation.en: You don't look like a Tyler.
translation.fr: T'as pas la tête d'un Tyler.
Je peux te poser une question ?

translation.en: That's not what I was going to ask. That's a strange last name, though.
translation.fr: J'allais pas demander ça. Mais c'est un drôle de nom.

translation.en: Isn't that like a gardening tool?
translation.fr: Ça veut dire râteau en anglais, non ?

translation.en: What were you gonna ask me?
If you were always this way. You know... brave.
translation.fr: Si tu as toujours été comme ça, tu sais... Courageux.

translation.en: Of course you are. You rescue people.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que si. Tu sauves les gens.

translation.en: Yeah, sometimes. Sometimes I do other things.
translation.fr: Oui, ça m'arrive. Parfois, je fais d'autres trucs.

translation.en: My father, he kills people, too.
translation.fr: Mon père tue des gens, lui aussi.

translation.en: Sometimes, I would sit with him at dinner, look at him and think,
translation.fr: Parfois, quand je dînais avec lui, je le regardais et je me disais :

translation.en: he just killed somebody else's father that day.
translation.fr: Il vient de tuer le père de quelqu'un.

translation.en: I did have me a wife.
I don't know. I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation.fr: Je sais pas. Je l'ai pas vue depuis longtemps.

translation.en: He died a few years ago.
translation.fr: Il est mort, il y a des années.

translation.en: I wasn't even there... when he died.
translation.fr: J'étais même pas là quand il est mort.

translation.en: Kandahar, Afghanistan. It was my third tour.
translation.fr: À Kandahar, en Afghanistan.Mon troisième service.

translation.en: I told you, mate. I'm not brave. I'm just...
translation.fr: Je te l'ai dit. Je suis pas courageux.

translation.en: "You drown not by falling into the river,
translation.fr: "On ne se noie pasen tombant dans la rivière,

translation.en: but by staying submerged in it."
I read it in a book in school.
translation.fr: Je l'ai lu dans un livre à l'école.

translation.en: -[in English] Yes. Yes! -[chuckles] I don't know...
It's the best dove hunting in Argentina.
Just lie in this pool... You lie in a pool and they fly around!
translation.fr: On est sur une mare,et les tourterelles volent autour !

translation.en: And you shoot them. [mimics gun firing]
And you sip a Cuba Libre.
I shot my first dove when I was ten years old. Have I told you this?
translation.fr: J'ai descendu ma première tourterelleà dix ans. Je te l'ai raconté ?

translation.en: No. It was when I was ten years old, my dad... My dad... The gun backfired,
translation.fr: J'avais dix ans, mon père...À cause du recul du fusil,

translation.en: gave me a black eye, and my dad laughs at me.
translation.fr: j'ai eu un œil au beurre noir,et mon père s'est moqué.

translation.en: I used to move so quick, kill those little shits.
translation.fr: J'étais super vifpour tuer ces petites merdes.

translation.en: It sucks getting old, man. Sucks! -[loudly] Getting old sucks. -Shh.
translation.fr: Ça craint de vieillir, mec.Putain ! Vieillir craint !

translation.en: That kid is a walking corpse.
translation.fr: Ce gamin est un cadavre ambulant.

translation.en: Asif will never let him live.
translation.fr: Asif le laissera pas s'en tirer.

translation.en: I mean, you get him home. And then, what? His father's in prison.
translation.fr: Tu le ramènes chez lui. Et après ? Son père est en prison.

translation.en: There's no way to protect him.
You know, the best thing you could do, honestly,
translation.fr: La meilleure chose que tu pourrais faire,

translation.en: would be to go up there right now and just go put a bullet in his brain.
translation.fr: c'est de monterlui tirer une balle dans la tête.

translation.en: 'Cause the animals out there, they're not gonna be... as kind to him.
translation.fr: Les animaux qui rôdent là-dehorsseront pas aussi cléments.

translation.en: They like to start with the ears.
Then they cut off each finger at the joint.
translation.fr: Puis ils coupent chaque doigtà l'articulation.

translation.en: You know how much he's worth?
We're talking about a kid, Gaspar.
We're talking about a gangster's kid.
With a price tag of ten million on his head.
You need to sober up, mate.
You're a mercenary, right, Tyler? Why don't you act the mercenary?
translation.fr: T'es un mercenaire, non ? Comporte-toi comme tel.

translation.en: Aren't you sick of this life? 'Cause I am and I...
translation.fr: T'en as pas marre de cette vie ?Moi, si et...

translation.en: I do not wanna end it playing hero on some goddamn suicide mission--
translation.fr: Je veux pas mourir en jouant les hérosdurant une putain de mission suicide...

translation.en: What are you doing? You said you'd help me.
I am helping you. Ten million dollars.
translation.fr: Je t'aide. Dix millions de dollars.

translation.en: I'll get you to the border in a couple hours.
It's money in your pocket. I take care of the body. Painless.
translation.fr: Tu prends ton blé.Je m'occupe du corps. Indolore.

translation.en: And it's the best that that kid can hope for.
translation.fr: Le gosse peut pas espérer mieux.

translation.en: -Did you call someone? Who'd you call? -[groans]
Why are you such a hypocrite? You've got the blood of a hundred men on your hands--
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu joues les hypocrites ?T'as tué plein d'hommes...

translation.en: Do you know happens to me if they find out that I'm helping you?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qui arriveras'ils apprennent que je t'aide ?

translation.en: Do you know what happens to my wife?
translation.fr: Ce qui arrivera à ma femme ?

translation.en: I did some work for him. We made a deal.
translation.fr: J'ai bossé pour lui. On a passé un accord.

translation.en: He gets the kid, you get your freedom, and we both get rich.
translation.fr: Il prend le gosse, tu es libre.Et on est tous les deux riches.

translation.en: What do you want from me? You want me to walk upstairs and shoot him in the head?
translation.fr: Tu veux quoi ? Que je montebuter le gosse dans la tête ?

translation.en: What are we doing, man? Huh?
I know it looks bad. I know it looks bad.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça présente mal.

translation.en: [Tyler] I've got the boy. I need your help.
translation.fr: J'ai le gamin. J'ai besoin de ton aide.

translation.en: Yeah, just like that. I want the boy out of here. That's all I care about.
translation.fr: Oui. Je veux sortir le gosse de là.C'est tout ce qui m'intéresse.

translation.en: He was gonna kill my family if I didn't get his son back.
translation.fr: Il aurait tué ma famillesi je ramenais pas son fils.

translation.en: My people are waiting for him on the other side of the Sultana Kamal bridge.
translation.fr: Mes hommes l'attendentà l'autre bout du pont Sultana Kamal.

translation.en: There's two blockades between here and there.
translation.fr: Il y a deux barrages sur le chemin.

translation.en: I'll do my best to draw them away from both.
translation.fr: Je vais tenter de les éloigner.

translation.en: You get him to the other side.
[in Hindi] We'll have to go on foot.
translation.fr: On doit y aller à pied.

translation.en: [in Bengali] Any sign of the boy?

translation.fr: Mais on a vu notre ami.

translation.en: Hey! I'm telling you to stop!
translation.fr: Je vous ai dit de vous arrêter !

translation.en: -Take his hat off. Let me see his face. -Huh?
translation.fr: Sa casquette. Fais voir son visage.

translation.en: [in Bengali] His hat. Take it off.
[in Bengali] Take two more units to the bridge.
Two units to the bridge. Hurry!
[in English] Stay here. Stay down. I'm gonna draw them away from you.
translation.fr: Reste ici. Reste baissé. Je les éloigne de toi.

translation.en: Rake, I need you on the bridge!
translation.fr: Rake, j'ai besoin de toi sur le pont !

translation.en: [Saju over radio] In hiding. About halfway across the bridge.
translation.fr: Caché. Vers le milieu du pont.

translation.en: I'm trying to clear a path.
Fuck! I'm taking fire. Abort. I'm going around.
translation.fr: Bordel ! Je me fais canarder.Je vais passer derrière.

translation.en: I need you to run as fast as you can for it.
translation.fr: Cours le plus vite possibledans sa direction.

translation.en: [Yaz] Bogeys are down. LZ clear. Two-minute window.
translation.fr: Véhicules HS. Zone d'atterrissage dégagée.On a 2 min.
